home.subtitle: Identify and manage weeds in your crops efficiently
home.search_description: Upload an image or use your camera to identify weeds in your field.
home.chemical_control_description: Find recommended chemical treatments and control methods for identified weeds.
home.contact_description: Get in touch with our team for support and inquiries.
home.easy_upload_description: Upload images or use your camera for instant weed identification
home.multi_language_description: Get information in English, Telugu, Tamil, and Hindi
home.accurate_detection_description: Advanced AI model for precise weed classification
home.purchase_links_description: Direct links to purchase recommended chemical treatments

search.title: Advanced Weed Classification System
search.subtitle: Upload a clear image of the weed for accurate identification and control recommendations
search.select_image_label: Click here to upload a weed image or drag and drop
search.select_image: Please select a clear image of the weed
search.no_confident_prediction: Unable to make a confident identification. Please provide a clearer image of the weed.

result.no_confident_prediction: Insufficient confidence in identification. Please provide a clearer image for accurate analysis.

chemical_control.title: Chemical Control
chemical_control.description: Find recommended chemical treatments and control methods for weed management
chemical_control.chemical_description: Browse through our recommended chemical treatments for effective weed control
chemical_control.control_description: Learn about various methods to control and prevent weed growth
chemical_control.no_info: No chemical control information available for this weed.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team
contact.success_message: Thank you for your message! We will get back to you soon.

footer.copyright: Â© 2024 Weed Classification System. All rights reserved.

Mollugo_verticillata.name: Mollugo verticillata
characteristics: Leaves may be attached to the stem or grow upwards, with branching
Leaves may be round or oval
Seeds may persist for several years

Cuscuta_campestris.name: Cuscuta campestris
characteristics: Leaves from yellow to orange-red color
Attached to host plants by haustoria
Seeds may persist for several years

Eclipta_prostrata.name: Eclipta prostrata
characteristics: Leaves may be attached to the stem or grow upwards
Seeds may persist for several years

Ipomoea_purpurea.name: Morning Glory
characteristics: Annual vine growing up to 3 meters

Euphorbia_maculata.name: Spotted Spurge
characteristics: Small green flowers with red spots

Amaranthus_tuberculatus.name: Waterhemp
characteristics: Male and female flowers on separate plants

Digitaria_sanguinalis.name: Crabgrass
characteristics: Stems are prostrate and rooting at nodes

supplements.title: Chemical Control
supplements.description: Find recommended chemical treatments and control methods for weed management
supplements.chemical_description: Effective herbicides for controlling weeds in cotton fields
supplements.no_products: No herbicide products available for this weed.
supplements.no_info: No chemical control information available for this weed.
